Wondering if there are any modules whic perform tasks such as

* saving / restoring desktop "state" ( which is different for each user )

* allowing remote monitoring / attach to the process remotely

 

etc

 

Thanks

Kumar
Not sure if this question is related to prism??

Hi Kumar,

A module is a functional unit that contains a set of related components and features of your application. The contents of a module depends mostly of the personal preferences of each developer and requirements of each application. So in my opinion, as the content of each module is defined by the developer, it's not be possible to have "standard" modules implemented.

You can find more information about modules and how they are used in modular applications in the following chapter of the Prism documentation:

  • Chapter 4: Modular Application Development in MSDN

I hope you find this useful,
